title: AREA CODE AND TIME ZONE LISTING
authors: Bovine Priest and Cultee: Reverend Dial Tone
historical_context: This article reflects the early days of telecommunications, providing essential information for phreakers and hackers navigating the phone system.
short_summary: This article provides a comprehensive listing of area codes and corresponding time zones across North America, serving as a useful reference for those involved in telecommunications and hacking.
summary: The article not only serves as a practical guide but also reflects the hacker culture of the late 1980s, where knowledge of telecommunications was crucial for successful exploits. By providing a straightforward reference, Reverend Dial Tone contributes to the community's understanding of area codes, which were essential for making long-distance calls and engaging in phreaking activities. The light-hearted tone and informal style make the content accessible and engaging, encouraging readers to print it out and keep it handy for their hacking endeavors.
